message: Too sweet! Did you mix in dessert instead of sugar?
Vinegar is perfect, balance is key.
Pineapple juice? This isn’t fruit punch, reduce it.
Sweetness is just right! Rich but not overpowering.
Cooking time nailed! The pork is soft and flavorful.
Perfect balance of sweet and savory—this is proper humba.
Wow! Your Humba is sweet, savory, and sticky-good—steps just got a little freestyle.
Perfectly caramelized! Steps may have danced, but the flavors sing “celebration!”
It's okay, just follow the steps next round for ultimate Filipino fiesta flavor.
Way too sweet! This humba tastes like dessert already.
The sweetness is overwhelming—this lost its savory soul.
That pineapple juice is shouting instead of blending in.
Too much pineapple juice turned this into syrup.
The vinegar bite is too sharp—it hurts going down.
That vinegar completely overpowered the dish.
This is way too salty—did the soy sauce spill?
The soy sauce drowned everything else out.
